content: ..Contract details..Code:0xfC75C3a882a5bF53d55F75a0300aC309A1d63d25Click here to view on block explorerManagement team will distribute the reward two weeks after the bounty campaign ends.Be creative, do not spamA good way to be creative is to study the project, understand the ecosystem and the industry. It will allow you to write good contents for your blog posts and video content...General Rules..ðŸ‘‰ You must follow TokenWhistle YouTube Channel on https://www.youtube.com/@TokenWhistleðŸ‘‰ You can not remove any work until the final payment is cleared.ðŸ‘‰ I and the TokenWhistle management have the full right to disqualify, deny or cancel any work.ðŸ‘‰ Do not use foul language, image,  No NSFW contents. Do Not CheatðŸ‘‰ You must provide BEP20 address to get paid. Address must not be from any exchange or custodial wallet.ðŸ‘‰ You mus post #Proof of Registration to join a campaign is requiredðŸ‘‰ Join Bounty Hunters group for bounty related information..Click here.. to access the Public Master Spreadsheet Â  Â ..Blog Bounty (Token allocation: 10,500 Tax)..ðŸ‘‰ Write a minimum 1,000 words article (blog post) and publish it only on any of the following platforms: Medium, Quora, publish0x, Reddit, Steemit or on your own blog** Own blog needs to have a branded custom domain and have minimum 500 unique visitors per month from the last 3 month's visitor statistics.ðŸ‘‰ You must register immediately using the form below...Blog Bounty Registration..Guidelines for blog postðŸ‘‰ Use a good title for the article that will contain the focus keyword.ðŸ‘‰ Include at least two images which go very well with the article. One of the image must be a featured image.ðŸ‘‰ Include the website URL (https://tokenwhistle.com/) as an external hyperlink in the article body. ðŸ‘‰ Include all social handles as external hyperlinks too at least once.Social handles:https://www.facebook.com/tokenwhistle/https://twitter.com/TokenWhistle/https://www.youtube.com/@TokenWhistle/https://t.me/tokenwhistle/ðŸ‘‰ You must add a minimum 1 internal link to one of the previous blog post you wrote in the past.ðŸ‘‰ Try to use some of the following keywords on your article body, while the main keyword for the article will be one from the following:TokenWhistle, Cryptocurrency app, Crypto tracking, Earning rewards, Mini red envelope airdrops, Digital assets, Crypto surprises, Crypto earnings, TokenWhistle review, Crypto app downloadPlease note that at the time of submitting your work you will must need to specify the focus keyword of your article or your work will be disqualified.ðŸ‘‰ Not more than 5 blog posts for one individual. One blog in one platform is acceptable.ðŸ‘‰ Add Proof of Authentication post URL at the bottom of the article to prove ownership.ðŸ‘‰ To receive rewards, once job done, you must fill up the report form at the bottom of this campaign threadRewardsDepending on the quality and engagement: Up to 15 StakesNo individual cap set for TokenWhistle blog bounty campaign...Video Bounty (Token allocation: 4,500 Tax)..ðŸ‘‰ You must subscribe to the TokenWhistle official YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@TokenWhistleðŸ‘‰ You must make a constructive comment on the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uXKBjdYmXkwðŸ‘‰ You must like and share the same video on at least one of your social media platform.ðŸ‘‰ Create a video of minimum 5 minutes length (must be original) and publish it on YouTubeðŸ‘‰ You must register immediately using the form below...Video Bounty Registration..Guidelines for videoðŸ‘‰ Use a good video title for the article that will contain a good keyword.ðŸ‘‰ Only English Voice-over will be acceptedðŸ‘‰ The video shall be unique and interesting, shot (narrated) in the first person, and contain a story about the userâ€™s experience. Video content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, pre-sale, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc. You are a content creator, please be creative.ðŸ‘‰ Video description must contains: Social handles and website URLhttps://tokenwhistle.com/https://www.facebook.com/tokenwhistle/https://twitter.com/TokenWhistle/https://www.youtube.com/@TokenWhistle/https://t.me/tokenwhistle/ðŸ‘‰ Video must be published on a Crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 500 subscribersðŸ‘‰ Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded. ðŸ‘‰ Videos that do not have a human voice-over (only background music etc) will only receive half the bounty. ðŸ‘‰ There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices. ðŸ‘‰ Sound and video quality must be high quality, although webcam and smartphone videos are accepted.ðŸ‘‰ During the bounty campaign, 1 (one) participant can submit only 1 (one) work.ðŸ‘‰ Request visitors to visit the URL: www.tokenwhistle.com (loud and clear voice pronounce w w w dot t o k e n w h i s t l e dot c o m)ðŸ‘‰ Add Proof of Authentication post URL at the bottom of the article to prove ownership.ðŸ‘‰ To receive rewards, once job done, you must fill up the report form at the bottom of this campaign threadRewardsDepending on the quality and engagement: Up to 15 StakesNo individual cap set for TokenWhistle video bounty campaign...How to submit work..ðŸ‘‰ Make sure you already registered for the bounty campaign.ðŸ‘‰ Fill up the following report form (s)You must specify the focus keyword of your article for blog bounty...Blog Bounty Report.. : Available - Click here to report..Video Bounty Report.. : Available - Click here to report..View Report Spreadsheet..ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.
